title: Shielded 2 Inch 10W 8-Ohm Full Range Speaker
blurb:
Full range speakers suitable for use in surround speakers in home theatre system, computer multimedia speakers and portable speaker designs. It has advanced alloy cone design coated with special damping material.
• 4 x screw mounting holes
General Data:
• Max Power Handling (Pmax)(W): 20
• Weight (M)(Kg): 0.12
Electrical Data:
• DC (Re)(Ω): 6.5
Voice Coil and Magnet Parameters:
• VC Diameter (mm): 25
• VC Length (H)(mm): 6
• VC Former: CCAW
• VC Frame: Kapton
• Magnet System: shielded
• Magnet Former: Neodymium
• Force Factor (BL)(N/A): 2.2
• Gap Height (He)(mm): 3
• Linear Excursion (Xmax)(mm): 1.5
T-S Parameters:
• Suspension Compliance (Cms)(uM/N): 356
• Mechanical Q (Qms): 4.6
• Electrical Q (Qes): 2.2
• Total Q (Qts): 1.56
• Moving Mass (Mms)(g): 1.26
• Effective Piston Area (Sd)(m2): 0.0013
• Equivalent Air Volume (Vas)(L): 0.2
• Resonance Frequency (Fs)(Hz): 260
